newsitem.title: INDIA: India bullion ranged on losses in global markets.
newsitem.headline: India bullion ranged on losses in global markets.

text.p: ** Gold 24 carat closed steady at 4,520 rupees per 10 gramme amid sluggish physical buying while supplies remained low during the day.
** Prices of a gold biscuit (116.64 gramme) closed steady at 52,900 rupees per piece.
** Silver (.999) closed 5 rupees lower at 6,245 rupees per kg on fresh arrivals after steady trend in the early trade.
